attributes.action: Stop Scottish Canals from Building the "Rotate" experience at the Falkirk wheel
attributes.background: Scottish Canals are developing plans for a new visitor experience for The Falkirk Wheel – A London Eye type experience that will sit in one of the gondolas At the wheel which will reduce boat movements at the wheel by 50% due to only one gondola being in operation

rejection.details:
This is the responsibility of Scottish Canals, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may be able to start a petition to the Scottish Parliament about this. You can contact the clerks of the Public Petitions Committee for advice about this by emailing petitions@scottish.parliament.uk.
